title: Filter Positive
code:
§begin filter_positive
  numbers ← [-3, 5, -1, 8, -2, 10]
  zero ← 0
  §iterate num §in numbers
    §if num ⊗ zero
      §transmit num
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: outputs only the positive numbers from an array
hints: The condition checks if numbers are positive
